section.name: LoggerLayoutTTCC

div.p: LoggerLayoutTTCC is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use LoggerLayoutPattern instead.

section.p: The TTCC layout format was taken from Apache log4j, and originally consisted of Time, Thread, Category and nested diagnostic Context information, hence the name.
Output of LoggerLayoutTTCC is identical to that of LoggerLayoutPattern with the conversion pattern set to %d{m/d/y H:i:s,u} [%t] %p %c %x - %m%n.

tr.td: If set to true, the process ID will be included in output.
If set to true, the logger name will be included in output.
If set to true, the nested diagnostic context will be included in output.
If set to true, the microseconds will be included in output.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p: For this example, some Nested Diagnostic Context is added also. Running the following code:
subsection.pre: 02/20/12 23:36:39,772 [9820] INFO myLogger Some Context - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. 02/20/12 23:36:39,773 [9820] DEBUG myLogger Some Context - Donec a diam lectus. 02/20/12 23:36:39,773 [9820] WARN myLogger Some Context - Sed sit amet ipsum mauris.
